JUMBO_MEMORYBLOCK Struct Reference

This structure defines the Jumbo memory block structure. More...


Data Fields

uint Flags
 Flags to indicate the memory block status.
UINT8 bData [1]
 Pointer to the memory block.

Detailed Description

This structure defines the Jumbo memory block structure.

This structure signifies each memory block allocation done using the jumbo packet buffer manager.

The documentation for this struct was generated from the following file:
